mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (TITLE, CONTENT, REGI_DATE, VIEW_CNT, LIKE_CNT, SHARE_CNT, ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_SIZE, MEM_SEQ, BOARD_SEQ, IMAGE, LAST_UPDATE) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{regiDate}, 0, 0, 0, #{roomType}, #{roomSize}, #{memSeq}, 1, #{image}, #{regiDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post_list_view No BETWEEN #{beginRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT A.*, COUNT(c.SEQ) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by p.SEQ DESC) AS No, p.*, h.KEYWORD, m.NICKNAME, m.PROFILE FROM hashtag h JOIN post p on h.POST_SEQ like p.SEQ JOIN member m on p.MEM_SEQ like m.seq WHERE h.KEYWORD like #{value} GROUP BY p.SEQ ) A LEFT JOIN comment c ON A.SEQ LIKE c.ARTICLE_SEQ AND c.BOARD_SEQ LIKE 1 GROUP BY A.seq
